\headI am bestowing upon you a sword and a
suit of armor. These have been in this
house for many, many years. They even
were here when I first became headman!
\headYou've never seen one with your own

\headI know you love traveling, so it's

\headHead outside of town and go to a
small forest in the valley between the

\headI will await you there. Make haste!
\headWe have... a lot to talk about.
\headI have to be honest with you.
is a lot more to all of this.
\headAnd while all the colonized portions of
the world may be beautiful... there is much
evil outside the walls that we built up.
\headThis evil extends beyond just monsters ruining
the balance of the Overworld. No, these conflicts
between man and monster have a very deep history.
\headDo you know what the source of this evil is?
Where the monsters came from? Why they're here?
\headI'm sure you know the story of
the First Champions. That's a tale
that has persisted in our culture
not account for our many defeats.
\headI will tell you the story of the Great Collapse.
You'll understand our situation after I'm done.
\headMy ancestors fought in this battle, and were
some of the few that survived the horrors. Their
stories have been passed down through my family.
\headI'm... not sure how to say this.
\headThe reason I'm telling you all of
this is because YOU have the potential
to be the one who defeats \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0].
\headYou should know by now that I don't
have much of a sense of humor. And the
possible fate of the human race is not
something that I would ever joke about.
Castle, every town in the world has
to elect at least one champion.
\headSome towns will pick more than one

few good candidates. But Solus Town...
Solus Town is a small settlement.
\head\N[1], YOU are the champion of Solus Town.
You were the only person me and your brother
\headI know... it's sudden, and it's a lot to take
in. We have been considering you for a couple
years now, and it still feels sudden even to me.
Still, let me explain what this role entails.
\headEach champion will have to go throughout the world,
defeating monsters to become stronger. Eventually,
you'll have to take down \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0]'s most powerful
people will write about in novels.
But this journey? This one is real.
\headI know I may not even be alive to see
the day that this world is purged of evil,
but until death do us part, I will ensure
you have everything necessary to save us all.
that comes with being a champion. Your
pick you for such a dangerous position.
\headThe only thing that could convince him that
you are the perfect champion was his belief in
your abilities and his pride in your growth.
\headYou won't be able to save the world by yourself,
so you'll need to make a few friends along the way.
\headVerdin Village should be a good bet for
recruiting team members. It's a frequent stop
for adventurers, and I'm sure there must be
some good candidates among its citizens.
\headYour brother went to Verdin for diplomatic duties,
so if you run into him, please send him my regards.
\headAnyways, remember that package you got me?
It had a fresh \ii[10] I ordered for you.
\headIf you look here, Verdin Village should
be marked. It's just southeast of Solus.
\headAfter you reach town, get some equipment,
and hopefully recruit a team member, I recommend
that you begin following The Trail.
